3ff8c413-a9fa-46d5-8cf1-90743d756b67.description:
Will npm install a supplied package only if not already found in node_modules .
Login account must have sudo access.
Use -g to install globally.
Usage: npmInstall packagename [-g]
3ff8c413-a9fa-46d5-8cf1-90743d756b67.name: npmInstall.sh

tempArr.c:
#!/bin/bash
return_=0
# set to 0 if found
ls node_modules | grep $1 >/dev/null 2>&1 && { return_=1; }
ls /usr/lib/node_modules | grep $1 >/dev/null 2>&1 && { return_=1; }
  if [ "$return_" -eq 1 ]; then
    echo Found
  else
    echo Not found
    sudo npm install $1 $2 --save#!/bin/bash
    sleep 3
  fi
echo done

3ff8c413-a9fa-46d5-8cf1-90743d756b67.script:
rm -f <%a.utilsPath%>/npmInstall.sh
saveTemplate:<%a.utilsPath%>/npmInstall.sh

setPromptCodes:3e 20

done

463949ca-9c9d-478a-b6d2-b0ac1376c1b8.description:
call createNewJSON.sh file [text to append]
Eg.
createNewJSON.sh /tmp/my.json '{}'
463949ca-9c9d-478a-b6d2-b0ac1376c1b8.name: createNewJSON.sh

tempArr.c:
#!/bin/sh

file=$1

if [ ! -e "$file" ] ; then
    touch "$file"
    echo $2 >> $file
fi

if [ ! -w "$file" ] ; then
    echo cannot write to $file
    exit 1
fi

echo var:createNewJSON:createNewJSON.sh

ops.insert:
Build and execute acme-client to retrieve cert, key & ca from letsencrypt. This will allow encrypted and ca verified https communication.
https://www.npmjs.com/package/acme-client. 
Only challenge type 'http-01' is implemented.

Change

.

Ensure this server has http port 80 open and publicly reachable via  <%a.hostName%>  and not redirecting when building. 
3 files are generated;
/home/%systemUser%/.ssl/%hostName%.key  
/home/%systemUser%/.ssl/%hostName%.cert
/home/%systemUser%/.ssl/%hostName%.csr 

After the files are generated you can enable https and redirect to https

b247e208-8a34-4eed-b0d8-608de71aade0.name: mount S3 bucket on amazon-linux EC2
b247e208-8a34-4eed-b0d8-608de71aade0.script:
#install amazon-linux-extras and s3fs-fuse if /etc/fuse.con does not exist
if [ ! -f /etc/fuse.conf ] ; then sudo amazon-linux-extras install -y epel ; sudo yum install -y -q s3fs-fuse; sudo bash -c 'echo "user_allow_other" >> /etc/fuse.conf' ; fi

mkdir <%c.mountPoint%> 

#try to mount
s3fs <%c.bucketName%> <%c.mountPoint%> -o iam_role=<%c.iam_role%> -o allow_other -o url="<%c.url%>"

#display  'Failed to check IAM role name' each time it is shown in last 500 llines of system log messages
sudo tail -500  /var/log/messages | grep 'Failed to check IAM role name'

#list the mount if it exists
mount | grep 's3fs'

    echo "{}" > <%a.dataPath%>/contactData/<%c.saveFileName%>
fi
setPrompt:[SysStack]

tempArr.c:
<!doctype html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
    <meta charset="utf-8" />
    <link rel="icon" type="image/png" href="images/ezStack-icon.png">
    <meta http-equiv="X-UA-Compatible" content="IE=edge,chrome=1" />

    <title>ezStack.Systems</title>

    <!--<meta content='width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0, maximum-scale=1.0, user-scalable=0' name='viewport' />-->
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=980, user-scalable=yes">
    
    <!--     Fonts and icons     -->
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="https://fonts.googleapis.com/icon?family=Material+Icons" />
    <link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Roboto:300,400,500,700" />
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="https://maxcdn.bootstrapcdn.com/font-awesome/latest/css/font-awesome.min.css" />

    <!-- CSS Files -->
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="https://maxcdn.bootstrapcdn.com/bootstrap/4.0.0/css/bootstrap.min.css" integrity="sha384-Gn5384xqQ1aoWXA+058RXPxPg6fy4IWvTNh0E263XmFcJlSAwiGgFAW/dAiS6JXm" crossorigin="anonymous">


    <link rel="stylesheet" href="/clientCSS/%viewName%.css" />

    <!--boot strap js-->
    <script src="https://code.jquery.com/jquery-3.3.1.js" crossorigin="anonymous"></script>
    <script src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/popper.js/1.12.9/umd/popper.min.js" integrity="sha384-ApNbgh9B+Y1QKtv3Rn7W3mgPxhU9K/ScQsAP7hUibX39j7fakFPskvXusvfa0b4Q" crossorigin="anonymous"></script>
    <script src="https://maxcdn.bootstrapcdn.com/bootstrap/4.0.0/js/bootstrap.min.js" integrity="sha384-JZR6Spejh4U02d8jOt6vLEHfe/JQGiRRSQQxSfFWpi1MquVdAyjUar5+76PVCmYl" crossorigin="anonymous"></script>



    <!-- %insertJsSrc% -->

    <!--%insertCSSSrc%-->

    <style>

ops.insert:
Provides a simple service to get jason data from a data store.
Returns a row or all rows. 
Call service with 'id=#' to get all rows. Call with 'id=[id]' to get a specific row.
Eg: 
http://myNode/ezGet&id=#
   This will return all rows
http://myNode/ezGet&id=123
  This will return only row where id=123

a, abbr, acronym, address, applet, article, aside, audio, b, big, blockquote, body, canvas, caption, center, cite, code, dd, del, details, dfn, div, dl, dt, em, embed, fieldset, figcaption, figure, footer, form, h1, h2, h3, h4, h5, h6, header, hgroup, html, i, iframe, img, ins, kbd, label, legend, li, main, mark, menu, nav, object, ol, output, p, pre, q, ruby, s, samp, section, small, span, strike, strong, sub, summary, sup, table, tbody, td, tfoot, th, thead, time, tr, tt, u, ul, var, video {

41a147ae-3802-482d-8b9a-cf9be8d4f732.script:
#Save service ejs 
rm -f <%s.viewsPath%>/<%p.viewName%>.ejs
saveTemplate:<%s.viewsPath%>/<%p.viewName%>.ejs
<%s.waitFor%> <%s.viewsPath%>/<%p.viewName%>.ejs

#use viewName for custom css & js file names
<%s.Replace file str with str%> '%viewName%' '<%p.viewName%>'  <%s.viewsPath%>/<%p.viewName%>.ejs

#insert title
<%s.Replace file str with str%> '%title%' '<%c.title%>' <%s.viewsPath%>/<%p.viewName%>.ejs

echo var:servicePathFileName:<%s.viewsPath%>/<%p.viewName%>.ejs
echo var:insertDocReadyJS:%insertDocReady%
echo var:insertScriptJS:%insertScript%

echo var:insertJsSrc:%insertJsSrc%
echo var:insertCSSSrc:%insertCSSSrc%

echo var:customCSSFileNamePath:<%s.staticPath%>/clientCSS/<%p.viewName%>.css
echo var:customJsFileNamePath:<%s.staticPath%>/clientJs/<%p.viewName%>.js

echo var:insertBodyHTML:%insertBodyHTML%
echo var:currentHTMLInsert:%insertBodyHTML%

#create blank custom css file
mkdir <%s.staticPath%>/clientCSS
export cssPath=<%s.staticPath%>/clientCSS/<%p.viewName%>.css
rm -f $cssPath 
touch $cssPath 
echo '<!-- %customCSSInsert% -->' >> $cssPath 

echo var:customCSSInsert:%customCSSInsert%

#create blank custom JS file
mkdir <%s.staticPath%>/clientJs
export jsPath=<%s.staticPath%>/clientJs/<%p.viewName%>.js
rm -f $jsPath 
touch $jsPath 
echo '<!-- %customJsInsert% -->' >> $jsPath 

echo var:customJsInsert:%customJsInsert%

ops.insert:
Provides a simple service to get jason data from a data store.
Returns a row or all rows. 
Call service with 'id=#' to get all rows. Call with 'id=[id]' to get a specific row.
Eg: 
http://myNode/ezGet&id=#
   This will return all rows
http://myNode/ezGet&id=123
  This will return only row where id=123

0af18940-a7d3-47d0-b6ac-f17ce8ac35b6.script:
#Save service ejs 
rm -f <%s.viewsPath%>/<%p.viewName%>.ejs
saveTemplate:<%s.viewsPath%>/<%p.viewName%>.ejs
<%s.waitFor%> <%s.viewsPath%>/<%p.viewName%>.ejs

echo var:customJsFileNamePath:<%s.staticPath%>/clientJs/<%p.viewName%>.js

ops.insert:
Calls sudo forever start to start the node process.

added to crontab manually:
 sudo crontab -u ec2-user -e
@reboot /home/ec2-user/projects/HelloWorld/restartServer.sh

204fd08e-b32f-4b41-b4d8-fb41ef076944.name: sudo re/start node once
204fd08e-b32f-4b41-b4d8-fb41ef076944.script:
cd <%a.projectPath%> 
<%s.npmInstall%> forever -g

rm -f <%a.projectPath%>/restartServer.sh
saveTemplate:<%a.projectPath%>/restartServer.sh
<%s.waitFor%> <%a.projectPath%>/restartServer.sh

<%s.Replace file str with str%> '%serverName%' <%a.nodeFileName%> <%a.projectPath%>/restartServer.sh

<%s.Replace file str with str%> '%projectPath%' <%a.projectPath%> <%a.projectPath%>/restartServer.sh

chmod 770 <%a.projectPath%>/restartServer.sh
nohup ./restartServer.sh > restart.log &

ops.insert:
Service to provide a video req and play over https.
Recording requires https to be installed and running since browsers will not turn on camera/mic with out a secure connection.
Access the service via https://[hostOrIP]:[httpsPort]/[serviceRoute]
Eg:  https://18.237.216.37:8445/meTube

9968612d-82a4-497e-a28a-5827398c880e.name: video stream

tempArr.c: {"0017840628170451955":{"vids":{"07759801911637512":{"vidName":"White Sands","vidDesc":"from https://file-examples.com/","ds":"Sun Sep 20 2020 10:49:36 GMT-0600 (Mountain Daylight Time)","thumb":"data:image/jpeg;base64,","fileLink":"https://filesamples.com/samples/video/mp4/sample_960x540.mp4"}},"status":"uploaded"}}

9968612d-82a4-497e-a28a-5827398c880e.script:
cd <%a.projectPath%>
<%s.npmInstall%> formidable 
cd ~

mkdir <%a.staticPath%>/videos 

echo var:viewName:<%c.viewName%> 
echo var:serviceRoute:<%a.urlPrefix%><%c.serviceRoute%> 

export tempFile=<%a.projectPath%>/temp.txt

rm -f $tempFile
saveTemplate:2:<%a.projectPath%>/temp.txt
<%s.waitFor%> $tempFile
cp $tempFile <%a.projectPath%>/demoVids.json

#save router code
rm -f $tempFile
saveTemplate:<%a.projectPath%>/temp.txt
<%s.waitFor%> $tempFile


<%s.Replace file str with str%> '%viewName%' <%c.viewName%> $tempFile

<%s.Replace file str with str%> '%serviceRoute%' '<%a.urlPrefix%><%c.serviceRoute%>' $tempFile

<%s.Replace file str with str%> '%vidFolder%' '<%a.staticPath%>/videos' $tempFile

<%s.Replace file str with str%> '%upload-name%' '<%c.upload-id%>' $tempFile

echo -e '\n<!-- <%a.insertServices%> -->' >> $tempFile 

#insert router code into Node script 
<%s.Replace file line with file%> '<%a.insertServices%>' $tempFile <%a.serverPathFile%>

echo var:testingHostPort:https://<%a.thisIP%>:<%c.httpsPort%>

rm -f $tempFile

b4210b31-dea4-4ef7-88c8-447b2b54fd88.script:
cd <%a.projectPath%> 
pwd
<%s.npmInstall%> express-session
<%s.npmInstall%> session-file-store
<%s.npmInstall%> password-hash

#Generate pw hash and create identity json

mkdir <%a.projectPath%>/identity
saveTemplate:3:<%a.projectPath%>/setIdentity.js
<%s.waitFor%> <%a.projectPath%>/setIdentity.js

node ./setIdentity.js
rm -f ./setIdentity.js


cd ~
pwd

export serverPathFile="<%p.serverPathFile%>"
export toReplace="//<add_Requires>"
export newline="var session = require('express-session');\nvar FileStore = require('session-file-store')(session);\n//<add_Requires>"

<%s.waitFor%> tmp.txt
<%s.Replace file str with str%> '%secret%' '<%c.secret%>' tmp.txt

<%s.Replace file line with file%> $toReplace tmp.txt "$serverPathFile"
rm -f tmp.txt

<%s.waitFor%> tmp.txt
<%s.Replace file str with str%> '%prefix%' '<%c.prefix%>' tmp.txt
export toReplace='<add_services>'
<%s.Replace file line with file%> $toReplace tmp.txt "$serverPathFile"
rm -f tmp.txt

echo var:urlPrefix:<%c.prefix%>

63f10982-7a16-41b6-8624-47ad46a503f2.description:
Provides a simple service to get jason data from a data store.
Returns a row or all rows. 
Call service with 'id=#' to get all rows. Call with 'id=[id]' to get a specific row.
Eg: 
http://myNode/ezGet&id=#
   This will return all rows
http://myNode/ezGet&id=123
  This will return only row where id=123

2b93f3c6-5333-4da7-b7db-143351e5031c.name: FM Data Store Delete (/fmDel)
2b93f3c6-5333-4da7-b7db-143351e5031c.script:
rm -f <%a.projectPath%>/myTemp.txt
saveTemplate:<%a.projectPath%>/myTemp.txt
<%s.waitFor%> <%a.projectPath%>/myTemp.txt

#insert jsonVar
<%s.Replace file str with str%> '%jsonVar%' <%p.dataStoreVar%> <%a.projectPath%>/myTemp.txt

#insert service End Point name
<%s.Replace file str with str%> '%serviceEndPointName%' '<%a.urlPrefix%><%c.serviceEndPointName%>'  <%a.projectPath%>/myTemp.txt
echo var:ezDataDelServiceEndPointName:<%a.urlPrefix%><%c.serviceEndPointName%>

#insert save service End Point name
<%s.Replace file str with str%> '%saveServiceFuncName%' <%c.saveServiceFuncName%>  <%a.projectPath%>/myTemp.txt

echo -e '\n<!-- <%a.insertServices%>  -->' >> <%a.projectPath%>/myTemp.txt 

#insert updated template into server file
<%s.Replace file line with file%> '<%a.insertServices%>' <%a.projectPath%>/myTemp.txt <%a.serverPathFile%> 

rm -f <%a.projectPath%>/myTemp.txt

13d5c45a-2c76-49e5-b0c7-3265d8cf0215.description:
Provides a simple service to get jason data from a data store.
Returns a row or all rows. 
Call service with 'id=#' to get all rows. Call with 'id=[id]' to get a specific row.
Eg: 
http://myNode/ezGet&id=#
   This will return all rows
http://myNode/ezGet&id=123
  This will return only row where id=123
13d5c45a-2c76-49e5-b0c7-3265d8cf0215.name: FM Data Store Get (/fmGet)
13d5c45a-2c76-49e5-b0c7-3265d8cf0215.script:
rm -f <%a.projectPath%>/myTemp.txt
saveTemplate:<%a.projectPath%>/myTemp.txt
<%s.waitFor%> <%a.projectPath%>/myTemp.txt

#insert jsonVar
<%s.Replace file str with str%> '%jsonVar%' <%p.dataStoreVar%> <%a.projectPath%>/myTemp.txt

#insert service End Point name
<%s.Replace file str with str%> '%serviceEndPointName%' '<%a.urlPrefix%><%c.serviceEndPointName%>'  <%a.projectPath%>/myTemp.txt
echo var:ezDataGetServiceEndPointName:<%a.urlPrefix%><%c.serviceEndPointName%>

echo -e '\n<!-- <%a.insertServices%>  -->' >> <%a.projectPath%>/myTemp.txt 

#insert updated template into server file
<%s.Replace file line with file%> '<%a.insertServices%>' <%a.projectPath%>/myTemp.txt <%a.serverPathFile%> 

rm -f <%a.projectPath%>/myTemp.txt

741323c4-ed58-4f7b-ac9b-e00e3cfa60e1.script:
#Save service ejs 
rm -f <%s.viewsPath%>/<%p.viewName%>.ejs
saveTemplate:<%s.viewsPath%>/<%p.viewName%>.ejs
<%s.waitFor%> <%s.viewsPath%>/<%p.viewName%>.ejs

#use viewName for custom css & js file names
<%s.Replace file str with str%> '%viewName%' <%p.viewName%>  <%s.viewsPath%>/<%p.viewName%>.ejs

echo var:servicePathFileName:<%s.viewsPath%>/<%p.viewName%>.ejs
echo var:insertDocReadyJS:%insertDocReady%

echo var:insertJsSrc:%insertJsSrc%
echo var:insertCSSSrc:%insertCSSSrc%

echo var:customCSSFileNamePath:<%s.staticPath%>/clientCSS/<%p.viewName%>.css
echo var:customJsFileNamePath:<%s.staticPath%>/clientJs/<%p.viewName%>.js

echo var:insertBodyHTML:%insertBodyHTML%
echo var:currentHTMLInsert:%insertBodyHTML%

#create blank custom css file
mkdir <%s.staticPath%>/clientCSS
export cssPath=<%s.staticPath%>/clientCSS/<%p.viewName%>.css
rm -f $cssPath 
touch $cssPath 
echo '<!-- %customCSSInsert% -->' >> $cssPath 

echo var:customCSSInsert:%customCSSInsert%


#create blank custom JS file
mkdir <%s.staticPath%>/clientJs
export jsPath=<%s.staticPath%>/clientJs/<%p.viewName%>.js
rm -f $jsPath 
touch $jsPath 
echo '<!-- %customJsInsert% -->' >> $jsPath 

echo var:customJsInsert:%customJsInsert%

tempArr.c:
<!doctype html>
<html lang="en"> 
<head>
    <meta charset="utf-8" />
    <link rel="icon" type="image/png" href="/images/ezStack-icon.png">
    <meta http-equiv="X-UA-Compatible" content="IE=edge,chrome=1" />

    <title>ezStack Systems Log Manager</title>

    <meta content='width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0, maximum-scale=1.0, user-scalable=0' name='viewport' />

    <!--     Fonts and icons     -->
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="https://fonts.googleapis.com/icon?family=Material+Icons" />
    <link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Roboto:300,400,500,700" />
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="https://maxcdn.bootstrapcdn.com/font-awesome/latest/css/font-awesome.min.css" />

    <!-- CSS Files -->
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="https://maxcdn.bootstrapcdn.com/bootstrap/4.0.0/css/bootstrap.min.css" integrity="sha384-Gn5384xqQ1aoWXA+058RXPxPg6fy4IWvTNh0E263XmFcJlSAwiGgFAW/dAiS6JXm" crossorigin="anonymous">
    
    <!--jquery js-->
    
    <script src="https://code.jquery.com/jquery-3.3.1.js" crossorigin="anonymous"></script>
    <script src="https://ajax.googleapis.com/ajax/libs/jqueryui/1.12.0/jquery-ui.min.js"></script>
    
    <!--boot strap js-->

    <script src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/popper.js/1.12.9/umd/popper.min.js" integrity="sha384-ApNbgh9B+Y1QKtv3Rn7W3mgPxhU9K/ScQsAP7hUibX39j7fakFPskvXusvfa0b4Q" crossorigin="anonymous"></script>
    <script src="https://maxcdn.bootstrapcdn.com/bootstrap/4.0.0/js/bootstrap.min.js" integrity="sha384-JZR6Spejh4U02d8jOt6vLEHfe/JQGiRRSQQxSfFWpi1MquVdAyjUar5+76PVCmYl" crossorigin="anonymous"></script>

    <!-- %insertJsSrc% -->

    <!--%insertCSSSrc%-->

    <link rel="stylesheet" href="/clientCSS/%viewName%.css" />

    <script type = "text/javascript" language = "javascript" >

        $(document).ready(function() {

            <!--%insertDocReady%-->
        });
        
        <!--%insertScript%-->

    </script>

</head>


<body class="index-page">

<!-- %insertBodyHTML% -->

</body>

<script src="/clientJs/%viewName%.js"></script>	



</html>

8b7b2c21-8217-4f9e-89fa-1db0ff371615.script:
#Save service ejs 
rm -f <%s.viewsPath%>/<%p.viewName%>.ejs
saveTemplate:<%s.viewsPath%>/<%p.viewName%>.ejs
<%s.waitFor%> <%s.viewsPath%>/<%p.viewName%>.ejs

#use viewName for custom css & js file names
<%s.Replace file str with str%> '%viewName%' <%p.viewName%>  <%s.viewsPath%>/<%p.viewName%>.ejs

echo var:servicePathFileName:<%s.viewsPath%>/<%p.viewName%>.ejs
echo var:insertDocReadyJS:%insertDocReady%
echo var:insertScriptJS:%insertScript%

echo var:insertJsSrc:%insertJsSrc%
echo var:insertCSSSrc:%insertCSSSrc%

echo var:customCSSFileNamePath:<%s.staticPath%>/clientCSS/<%p.viewName%>.css
echo var:customJsFileNamePath:<%s.staticPath%>/clientJs/<%p.viewName%>.js

echo var:insertBodyHTML:%insertBodyHTML%
echo var:currentHTMLInsert:%insertBodyHTML%

#create blank custom css file
mkdir <%s.staticPath%>/clientCSS
export cssPath=<%s.staticPath%>/clientCSS/<%p.viewName%>.css
rm -f $cssPath 
touch $cssPath 
echo '<!-- %customCSSInsert% -->' >> $cssPath 

echo var:customCSSInsert:%customCSSInsert%

#create blank custom JS file
mkdir <%s.staticPath%>/clientJs
export jsPath=<%s.staticPath%>/clientJs/<%p.viewName%>.js
rm -f $jsPath 
touch $jsPath 
echo '<!-- %customJsInsert% -->' >> $jsPath 

echo var:customJsInsert:%customJsInsert%

Will get a data row and update fields. 
This component supports Quill(tm) inputs. Populate fields the the ids of text inputs separated by semi-colon.

DataGetServiceEndPointName is the unique service name that you choose.

6f40932f-f82b-4afb-9917-a0375ec1f8d9.description:
Install headless Chrome in EC2 RHEL 7.3 using yum
http://docs.aws.amazon.com/AWSEC2/latest/UserGuide/add-repositories.html
https://medium.com/@davidkadlec/installing-google-chrome-on-amazon-linux-ec2-d1cb6aa37f28
https://www.sitepoint.com/headless-chrome-node-js/
6f40932f-f82b-4afb-9917-a0375ec1f8d9.name: install headless Chrome

tempArr.c:
#!/bin/sh
sudo rm -f /etc/yum.repos.d/google-chrome.repo
sudo touch /etc/yum.repos.d/google-chrome.repo
sudo chmod 666 /etc/yum.repos.d/google-chrome.repo

sudo echo -e "[google-chrome]
name=google-chrome
baseurl=http://dl.google.com/linux/chrome/rpm/stable/\$basearch
enabled=1
gpgcheck=1
gpgkey=https://dl-ssl.google.com/linux/linux_signing_key.pub" >> /etc/yum.repos.d/google-chrome.repo

sudo touch /etc/yum.repos.d/centos.repo
sudo chmod 666 /etc/yum.repos.d/centos.repo

sudo echo -e "[CentOS-base]
name=CentOS-6 - Base
mirrorlist=http://mirrorlist.centos.org/?release=6&arch=x86_64&repo=os
gpgcheck=1
gpgkey=http://mirror.centos.org/centos/RPM-GPG-KEY-CentOS-6

" >> /etc/yum.repos.d/centos.repo

sudo echo -e "#released updates
[CentOS-updates]
name=CentOS-6 - Updates
mirrorlist=http://mirrorlist.centos.org/?release=6&arch=x86_64&repo=updates
gpgcheck=1
gpgkey=http://mirror.centos.org/centos/RPM-GPG-KEY-CentOS-6

" >> /etc/yum.repos.d/centos.repo

sudo echo -e "#additional packages that may be useful
[CentOS-extras]
name=CentOS-6 - Extras
mirrorlist=http://mirrorlist.centos.org/?release=6&arch=x86_64&repo=extras
gpgcheck=1
gpgkey=http://mirror.centos.org/centos/RPM-GPG-KEY-CentOS-6
" >> /etc/yum.repos.d/centos.repo

sudo yum install -y google-chrome-stable
sudo chmod 600 /etc/yum.repos.d/google-chrome.repo
sudo chmod 600 /etc/yum.repos.d/centos.repo

sudo yum -y install gnu-free-sans-fonts

google-chrome-stable --version

6f40932f-f82b-4afb-9917-a0375ec1f8d9.script:
mkdir ~/tmp
cd ~/tmp
rm -f installChrome.sh
pwd
ls -l
saveTemplate:/home/<%s.systemUser%>/tmp/installChrome.sh
<%s.waitFor%> /home/<%s.systemUser%>/tmp/installChrome.sh
sudo yum repolist all

chmod 770 ~/tmp/installChrome.sh

./installChrome.sh

ops.insert:
Installs and calls sudo forever start to start node process.

added to crontab manually:
 sudo crontab -u SysStackUser -e
@reboot /home/SysStackUser/projects/proto/restartServer.sh

32a1924c-32e8-44d6-adea-1ca6fadc97c9.name: Re/start builder
32a1924c-32e8-44d6-adea-1ca6fadc97c9.script:
cd <%a.projectPath%> 

<%s.npmInstall%> forever -g

rm -f restartServer.sh
saveTemplate:<%a.projectPath%>/restartServer.sh
<%s.waitFor%> <%a.projectPath%>/restartServer.sh

<%s.Replace file str with str%> '%serverName%' <%c.server%> <%a.projectPath%>/restartServer.sh

<%s.Replace file str with str%> '%projectPath%' <%a.projectPath%> <%a.projectPath%>/restartServer.sh

chmod 770 ./restartServer.sh
rm -f nohup.out
restart:
nohup ./restartServer.sh > restart.log &
sleep 7

ops.insert:
Backup Builder Components
SystemsJSON.json and ./uploads will be zipped into c.backTo/backup_$fileDate.zip

37c7093b-26ea-4bd9-abaa-3412dfcae62c.name: Backup Builder Components
37c7093b-26ea-4bd9-abaa-3412dfcae62c.script:
cd <%a.projectPath%>/uploads 
rm -f backup_*.zip
fileDate=$(date +%Y-%m-%d_%H-%M-%S)
fileName=backup_$fileDate.zip
cp ../SystemsJSON.json .
cp ../BuildCode.json .
zip -r $fileName .
ls -l *.zip
mv $fileName <%c.backTo%> 
ls -l <%c.backTo%>

0d9d9854-0b01-4b63-ad6e-3076964d7a69.name: Upgrade Builder
0d9d9854-0b01-4b63-ad6e-3076964d7a69.script:
curl https://codeload.github.com/sbgh/builder/zip/master > builder.zip
unzip -o builder.zip
yes | cp -fr ./builder-master/SystemsJSON.json ./builder/SystemsJSON.json
yes | cp -fr ./builder-master/BuildCode.json ./builder/BuildCode.json
yes | cp -fr ./builder-master/builder.js ./builder/builder.js
yes | cp -fr ./builder-master/views/* ./builder/views/
yes | cp -fr ./builder-master/uploads/* ./builder/uploads/
yes | cp -fr ./builder-master/static/* ./builder/static/
yes | cp -fr ./builder-master/setup/* ./builder/setup/
unzip -o ./builder/uploads/uploads.zip -d ./builder/uploads
cd builder
rm -f nohup.out
restart:
nohup ./restartServer.sh > restart.log &
sleep 7
